name: Chase Shooting 3D
description:
Welcome to the action!

Have you ever dreamed being in a action movie? It's here!

It's high time! Chase Shooting 3D!

You will not be able to take your eyes off the legendary and unique explosion scenes!
There are a lot of cars waiting to be blown up, you know? So what are you waiting for?
Control your weapons easily, simply aim and shoot!

Chase various car types, blow them up!

Unlimited types of explosion scenes!

Absolute fun!

Are your belts tied? You better have your belts tied.
publishers: Hyperbox Games Yazilim Bilisim Limited Sirketi
